Uses of Class
User

    • Uses of User in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of User in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Attendee
      Standard user class that represents users who will be signing up and attending conference events.
      class  Organizer
      A class representing an organizer user.
      class  Speaker
      This class represents speakers for the events.
